titles.title: For the relief of Rosario Amato and Salvatore Amato.
For the relief of Rosario Amato and Salvatore Amato.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Rosario Amato and Salvatore Amato to each be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
